name: OnPlayerRequestClass
notes: This callback is also called when a player presses F4.
description: Called when a player changes class at class selection (and when class selection first appears).

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that changed class.

params_body.name: classid
params_body.description: The ID of the current class being viewed (returned by AddPlayerClass).

return_values: It is always called first in filterscripts.
related_cb:
OnPlayerRequestSpawn: Called when a player attempts to spawn via class selection.
 AddPlayerClass: Add a class.
